description: The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement to procure goods and training services related to Explosive Ordinance Disposal (EOD) / Improvised Explosive Devices (IEDs) from suppliers who meet all the Mandatory Technical Criteria (MTC) specified in Annex B. full_summary:
Tender for Explosive Devices Training Services
=============================

**Notice Details**

*   Reference Number: PW-_KIN-956-8727
*   Solicitation Number: W6399-23DB10/B
*   Publication Date: 2023-01-27
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-02-21
*   Amendment Number: 1
*   Amendment Date: 2023-02-08

**Notice Type**

The Government of Canada invites bidders to submit a proposal for the Supply Agreement for Explosive Devices Training Services.

**Objective**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the procurement of goods and services related to Explosive Ordinance Disposal (EOD)/Improvised Explosive Devices (IEDs) from suppliers who meet all the Mandatory Technical Criteria (MTC) specified in Annex B.

**Term and Delivery**

The term of the Supply Arrangement is until March 31, 2028. Delivery dates are specified in the solicitation document.

**Language and Documents**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Eligibility and Selection**

Eligible suppliers can submit a bid. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) is applicable. The selection criteria are specified in the solicitation document.

**Mandatory Technical Criteria (MTC)**

Suppliers must meet all the Mandatory Technical Criteria (MTC) specified in Annex B.

**Electronic Submissions**

Interested bidders should refer to Part 2 of the solicitation document for instructions on how to participate and submit their files electronically for this Supply Agreement.

**Contact Information**

Public Works and Government Services Canada
Shamael Malko-Moore
